mapper.select: select A.WorkOrder_No, A.WorkOrder_ONo, A.WorkOrder_ItemCode, B.PRODUCT_ITEM_NAME WorkOrder_ItemName, B.PRODUCT_INFO_STND_1 WorkOrder_Item_STND_1, A.WorkOrder_EquipCode, C.EQUIPMENT_INFO_NAME WorkOrder_EquipName, D.Sales_SM_Last_Qty + D.Sales_SM_In_Qty - D.Sales_SM_Out_Qty WorkOrder_SQty, A.WorkOrder_PQty, A.WorkOrder_RQty, A.WorkOrder_RegisterTime, A.WorkOrder_ReceiptTime, A.WorkOrder_OrderTime, A.WorkOrder_StartTime, A.WorkOrder_CompleteOrderTime, A.WorkOrder_CompleteTime, A.WorkOrder_WorkStatus, E.CHILD_TBL_TYPE WorkOrder_WorkStatusName, A.WorkOrder_Remark, A.WorkOrder_Use_Status from WorkOrder_tbl A inner join PRODUCT_INFO_TBL B on A.WorkOrder_ItemCode = B.PRODUCT_ITEM_CODE inner join EQUIPMENT_INFO_TBL C on A.WorkOrder_EquipCode = C.EQUIPMENT_INFO_CODE left outer join Sales_StockMatLX_tbl D on A.WorkOrder_ItemCode = D.Sales_SM_Code inner join (SELECT * FROM DTL_TBL where NEW_TBL_CODE = '29') E on A.WorkOrder_WorkStatus = E.CHILD_TBL_NO where A.WorkOrder_RegisterTime >= #{startDate} and A.WorkOrder_RegisterTime < #{endDate} and A.WorkOrder_WorkStatus = '242' order by A.WorkOrder_RegisterTime DESC

select A.WorkOrder_No, A.WorkOrder_ONo, A.WorkOrder_ItemCode, B.Product_Item_Name WorkOrder_ItemName, B.Product_Info_STND_1 WorkOrder_INFO_STND_1, A.WorkOrder_EquipCode, C.Equipment_Info_Name WorkOrder_EquipName, if(A.WorkOrder_EquipCode LIKE 'M0%', A.WorkOrder_EquipCode, '') as EQUIPMENT_INFO_CODE, if(A.WorkOrder_EquipCode LIKE 'M1%', A.WorkOrder_EquipCode, '') as EQUIPMENT_PACK_CODE, if(A.WorkOrder_EquipCode LIKE 'M0%', C.Equipment_Info_Name, '') as EQUIPMENT_INFO_NAME, if(A.WorkOrder_EquipCode LIKE 'M1%', C.Equipment_Info_Name, '') as EQUIPMENT_PACK_NAME, A.WorkOrder_RegisterTime, A.WorkOrder_StartTime, A.WorkOrder_CompleteTime, A.WorkOrder_WorkStatus, D.CHILD_TBL_TYPE WorkOrder_Item_STND_1, G.CHILD_TBL_TYPE WorkOrder_Item_STND_2, E.CHILD_TBL_TYPE WorkOrder_WorkStatusName, A.WorkOrder_Remark, F.User_Name WorkOrder_Worker, A.WorkOrder_Use_Status from WorkOrder_tbl A inner join Product_Info_tbl B on A.WorkOrder_ItemCode = B.PRODUCT_ITEM_CODE inner join Equipment_Info_tbl C on A.WorkOrder_EquipCode = C.EQUIPMENT_INFO_CODE inner join (SELECT * FROM DTL_TBL where NEW_TBL_CODE = '6') D on B.Product_Item_CLSFC_1 = D.CHILD_TBL_NO inner join (SELECT * FROM DTL_TBL where NEW_TBL_CODE = '29') E on A.WorkOrder_WorkStatus = E.CHILD_TBL_NO inner join User_Info_tbl F on A.WorkOrder_Worker = F.User_Code inner join (SELECT * FROM DTL_TBL where NEW_TBL_CODE = '7') G on B.Product_Item_CLSFC_2 = G.CHILD_TBL_NO where A.WorkOrder_WorkStatus = '243' order by A.WorkOrder_RegisterTime DESC
SELECT count(*) FROM WorkOrder_tbl where WorkOrder_EquipCode = #{WorkOrder_EquipCode} and WorkOrder_WorkStatus = '244';

SELECT A.WorkOrder_ONo, A.WorkOrder_ItemCode, B.PRODUCT_ITEM_NAME WorkOrder_ItemName, B.PRODUCT_INFO_STND_1 WorkOrder_Item_STND_1, B.PRODUCT_MULTIPLE WorkOrder_Item_Multiple, A.WorkOrder_EquipCode, A.WorkOrder_PQty, A.WorkOrder_RQty, A.WorkOrder_RegisterTime, A.WorkOrder_Remark FROM WorkOrder_tbl A inner join Product_Info_tbl B on A.WorkOrder_ItemCode = B.Product_Item_Code where A.WorkOrder_EquipCode = #{MachineCode} and WorkOrder_WorkStatus = (select CHILD_TBL_NO from DTL_TBL where NEW_TBL_CODE = '29' and CHILD_TBL_NUM = '1')
SELECT count(*) FROM WorkOrder_tbl where WorkOrder_RegisterTime >= curdate();

SELECT *, t2.Product_Item_Name WorkOrder_ItemName, t2.Product_Info_STND_1, t3.Equipment_Info_Name WorkOrder_EquipName, t4.CHILD_TBL_TYPE workOrder_WorkStatusName ,DATE_FORMAT(a1.WorkOrder_StartTime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') WorkOrder_StartTime2 ,DATE_FORMAT(a1.WorkOrder_CompleteTime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') WorkOrder_CompleteTime2 ,DATE_FORMAT(a1.WorkOrder_RegisterTime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') WorkOrder_RegisterTime2 FROM (
SELECT * FROM WorkOrder_tbl t1 WHERE t1.WorkOrder_WorkStatus = '244' UNION ALL SELECT * FROM WorkOrder_tbl t1 WHERE WorkOrder_WorkStatus <> '242' AND t1.WorkOrder_WorkStatus <> '244' AND WorkOrder_RegisterTime >= #{startDate} and WorkOrder_RegisterTime < #{endDate}
) a1 INNER JOIN Product_Info_tbl t2 ON a1.WorkOrder_ItemCode = t2.Product_Item_Code INNER JOIN Equipment_Info_tbl t3 ON a1.WorkOrder_EquipCode = t3.Equipment_Info_Code INNER JOIN DTL_TBL t4 ON a1.WorkOrder_WorkStatus = t4.CHILD_TBL_NO WHERE
(WorkOrder_ItemCode = '' OR 1=1)
(WorkOrder_ItemCode = #{ItemCode})
AND
(WorkOrder_EquipCode = '' OR 1=1)
(WorkOrder_EquipCode = #{MachineCode})
ORDER BY WorkOrder_EquipCode,FIELD(a1.WorkOrder_WorkStatus,'244','243','245')
